summary: The diff does not provide evidence that the founder photo asset was replaced at the required static path, and it does not show the founder bio being added with the exact required text. There is also evidence suggesting a different (non-requested) founder bio was described/introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the About Us page founder image with the user-uploaded photo, processed to a center-cropped 300x400 (3:4) portrait, saved at `frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg`, and loaded at runtime via `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` without 404/broken image.
missing_requirements.reason: No new/modified static image asset is shown at `frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg`, and the truncated AboutUsPage.tsx excerpt does not show the founder image `src` being set to `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` nor any evidence of the uploaded image being processed/cropped to 300x400.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx (truncated; no founder image section shown)
File diff summary shows no added files (no static asset replacement is evidenced)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the short, generic founder bio beneath the founder title using the text exactly: "I’m passionate about helping individuals and families choose the right insurance with clarity, transparency, and long-term support. My goal is to make protection simple—so you can focus on what matters most."
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show the founder section content, and the only explicit description of the founder bio indicates different wording (about decade of experience/vision) rather than the exact required text.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AboutUsPage.tsx description mentions a bio about "decade of experience and vision for simplifying insurance")
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx (truncated; no founder bio text visible)

hallucinated_features.description: Founder bio text describing the founder's decade of experience and vision for simplifying insurance (instead of the exact required generic bio text).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires the provided bio text exactly; the diff summary describes a different bio being present.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AboutUsPage.tsx summary: "short bio describing his decade of experience and vision for simplifying insurance")
